metadata.name: Kika Nicolela - Affects II
metadata.description:
'Affects II' continues my exploration on AI video conveying profound emotions, links, touches and affects.

I am a Brazilian artist, filmmaker and curator based in Brussels. I have participated of hundreds of solo and group exhibitions at art institutions worldwide for the past 20 years. I am represented by the Galerie Charlot (Paris/Tel Aviv) and Area35 (Milan).
